fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: The language of the resource expressed as a BCP47 language tag.
The main title of the publication.
Alternative or parallel titles of the publication, suffixed with a BCP47 language tag in curly brackets.
The primary author(s) of the resource.
The year on which the resource was issued or made available.
The entity/entities responsible for making the resource available.
The Digital Object Identifier (DOI) associated with the resource.
The ISBN associated with the electronic resource.
The ISBN of the printed version of this document.
The ISSN associated with the electronic resource.
The ISSN of the printed version of this document.
The type of the resource according to the COAR Resource Types classification.
